articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola wants the English Football League to change their rules to allow Marc Guehi to play in the Carabao Cup final against Arsenal.
articles.title: Manchester City: Pep Guardiola calls for EFL Cup rule change so Marc Guehi can play in Wembley final

articles.description: Bruce Mouat and Jen Dodds overcome a power cut and the loss of the first end to get Team GB's Winter Olympics off to a winning start in the mixed doubles curling against Norway.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Bruce Mouat and Jen Dodds get Team GB off to winning start

articles.description: Consistency is the next step for Rangers winger Mikey Moore after a standout performance against Kilmarnock, says head coach Danny Rohl.
articles.title: Mikey Moore: Is Tottenham loanee the answer to Rangers' open-play issues?

articles.description: Senior figures in sport maintained personal contact with Jeffrey Epstein, while others were discussed regarding potential deals.
articles.title: Epstein files: Football, F1, and NFL bosses kept links after sex conviction

articles.description: Holders Newcastle United were knocked out of the Carabao Cup by Manchester City on Wednesday night and a challenging season shows no sign of relenting.
articles.title: Newcastle: More questions than answers as Eddie Howe's men yet to catch fire this season

articles.description: John Virgo was an excellent snooker player, a hugely popular TV figure, and one of the great voices of his beloved sport.
articles.title: John Virgo obituary: Snooker, Big Break and BBC commentary - the Salford sage leaves his stage

articles.description: Great Britain's Sonay Kartal beats lucky loser Renata Zarazua to reach the last eight of the Abu Dhabi Open after original opponent - and defending champion - Belinda Bencic withdraws through illness.
articles.title: Sonay Kartal beats lucky loser after Belinda Bencic withdraws in Abu Dhabi

articles.description: In a wide-ranging interview, Brendon McCullum talks about Harry Brook's altercation with a nightclub bouncer and the criticism of England's off-field behaviour.
articles.title: Brendon McCullum on Harry Brook, Ashes and Noosa trip

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo might ask to leave Al-Nassr, Nottingham Forest's Elliot Anderson tops Manchester United's list of midfield targets, Atletico Madrid want Tottenham's Cristian Romero, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Ronaldo, Romero, Anderson, Casemiro, Tonali, Neves, Roefs, Nketiah

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at Manchester City's evolution and why the January window has offered renewed belief.
articles.title: Manchester City: Pep Guardiola succession plan and team rebuild
